content: this text is about the progress of a legal case regarding costs and compensation the specific details of the case are not mentioned but it involves a procedure related to costs and compensation the duration of the procedure is not specified the final resolution states that the value of the goods involved is negative a personal bank account has been opened for the person involved who has unpaid pension benefits the assets will be divided between two heirs with each receiving half the case involves the application of the inheritance act specifically article 11 the deceased persons estate includes funds in a bank account and unpaid pension benefits the court determined that the deceased persons son and daughter are the intestate heirs and will each receive a 12 share of the inheritance the court initiated inheritance proceedings based on the inheritance act since the deceased did not leave a will the process of lodging an appeal in the case is also explained the appellant has 15 days to lodge an appeal with the court providing enough copies and necessary information the appeal will be decided by the ljubljana high court the appeal must be clear and include the grounds for the appeal if the appeal is lodged by a proxy they must be a qualified lawyer the court fee must be paid when lodging the appeal and failure to do so within the specified time will result in the appeal being considered withdrawn the appeal is considered lodged on the last day of the appeal period if sent by registered post
